## `EvaluateCore`: Quality Evaluation of Core Collections ![logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aravind-j/EvaluateCore/master/inst/extdata/EvaluateCore.png)

###### Version : [0.1.4](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/); Copyright (C) 2018-2025: [ICAR-NBPGR](http://www.nbpgr.ernet.in/); License: [GPL-2\|GPL-3](https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/)

##### *Aravind, J.¹, Kaur, V.², Wankhede, D. P.³ and Nanjundan, J.⁴*

1.  Division of Germplasm Conservation, ICAR-National Bureau of Plant
    Genetic Resources, New Delhi.
2.  Division of Germplasm Evaluation, ICAR-National Bureau of Plant
    Genetic Resources, New Delhi.
3.  Division of Genomic Resources, ICAR-National Bureau of Plant Genetic
    Resources, New Delhi.
4.  ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute, Regional Station,
    Wellington, Tamil Nadu.

## Description

Implements various quality evaluation statistics to assess the value of
plant germplasm core collections using qualitative and quantitative
phenotypic trait data according to Odong et al. (2015)
[doi:10.1007/s00122-012-1971-y](https://doi.org/10.1007/s00122-012-1971-y).

## Installation

The package can be installed from CRAN as follows:

``` r
# Install from CRAN
install.packages('EvaluateCore', dependencies=TRUE)
```

The development version can be installed from github as follows:

``` r
# Install development version from Github
devtools::install_github("aravind-j/EvaluateCore")
```

## What’s new

To know whats new in this version type:

``` r
news(package='EvaluateCore')
```

## Links

[CRAN page](https://cran.r-project.org/package=EvaluateCore)

[Github page](https://github.com/aravind-j/EvaluateCore)

[Documentation website](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/)

[Zenodo DOI](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3875930)

## Citing `EvaluateCore`

To cite the methods in the package use:

``` r
citation("EvaluateCore")
```

``` R
To cite the R package 'EvaluateCore' in publications use:

  Aravind, J., Kaur, V., Wankhede, D. P. and Nanjundan, J. (2025).  EvaluateCore: Quality Evaluation of Core Collections.
  R package version 0.1.4, https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=EvaluateCore.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {EvaluateCore: Quality Evaluation of Core Collections},
    author = {J. Aravind and Vikender Kaur and Dhammaprakash Pandhari Wankhede and J. Nanjundan},
    year = {2025},
    note = {R package version 0.1.4 https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/ https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=EvaluateCore},
  }

This free and open-source software implements academic research by the authors and co-workers. If you use it, please
support the project by citing the package.
```

# Package index

## Quantitative traits - Compare Measures of Location

- [`snk.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/snk.evaluate.core.md)
  : Student-Newman-Keuls Test
- [`wilcox.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/wilcox.evaluate.core.md)
  : Wilcoxon Rank Sum Test
- [`ttest.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/ttest.evaluate.core.md)
  : Student's t Test
- [`signtest.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/signtest.evaluate.core.md)
  : Sign Test

## Quantitative traits - Compare Measures of Scale

- [`levene.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/levene.evaluate.core.md)
  : Levene's Test
- [`iqr.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/iqr.evaluate.core.md)
  : Interquartile Range
- [`cr.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/cr.evaluate.core.md)
  : Coincidence Rate of Range
- [`vr.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/vr.evaluate.core.md)
  : Variable Rate of Coefficient of Variation
- [`scv.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/scv.evaluate.core.md)
  : Synthetic Variation Coefficient

## Quantitative traits - Compare Measures of Distribution

- [`box.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/box.evaluate.core.md)
  : Box Plots
- [`pdfdist.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/pdfdist.evaluate.core.md)
  : Distance Between Probability Distributions
- [`qq.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/qq.evaluate.core.md)
  : Quantile-Quantile Plots

## Quantitative traits - Other comparisons

- [`percentdiff.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/percentdiff.evaluate.core.md)
  : Percentage Difference of Means and Variances
- [`pca.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/pca.evaluate.core.md)
  : Principal Component Analysis

## Qualitative trait comparisons

- [`bar.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/bar.evaluate.core.md)
  : Bar Plots
- [`chisquare.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/chisquare.evaluate.core.md)
  : Chi-squared Test for Homogeneity
- [`coverage.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/coverage.evaluate.core.md)
  : Class Coverage
- [`diversity.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/diversity.evaluate.core.md)
  : Diversity Indices
- [`rpr.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/rpr.evaluate.core.md)
  : Ratio of Phenotype Retained
- [`vpf.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/vpf.evaluate.core.md)
  : Variance of Phenotypic Frequency

## Compare both qualitative and quantitative traits

- [`corr.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/corr.evaluate.core.md)
  : Phenotypic Correlations
- [`dist.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/dist.evaluate.core.md)
  : Distance Measures
- [`freqdist.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/freqdist.evaluate.core.md)
  : Frequency Distribution Histogram

## Datasets

- [`cassava_EC`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/cassava_EC.md)
  : IITA Cassava Germplasm Data - Entire Collection
- [`cassava_CC`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/cassava_CC.md)
  : IITA Cassava Germplasm Data - Core Collection

## Deprecated

- [`shannon.evaluate.core()`](https://aravind-j.github.io/EvaluateCore/reference/EvaluateCore-deprecated.md)
  :

  Deprecated functions in package EvaluateCore.
